public class HaberdasherException
extends RuntimeException
Catch-all exception for Haberdashery errors, until we figure out what the real error set consists of.

HaberdasherException()
Constructs a HaberdasherException with no detail message.
HaberdasherException(String)
Constructs a HaberdasherException with the specified detail message.

HaberdasherException 
  public HaberdasherException()
Constructs a HaberdasherException with no detail message.
HaberdasherException 
  public HaberdasherException(String msg)
Constructs a HaberdasherException with the specified detail message.
Parameters:
msg - the detail message
